description: While always open and willing to learn new skills and technologies, I work predominantly in Javascript. Focusing on delivering high quality products and complex solutions.

{ Core }: Code maintainability and quality are parmount to me. I'm using Jest and Enzyme for unit and integration tests.
I always rely on GIT version control system and try to document my code base properly
I can customize Webpack configurations and I'm proficient with NPM and Yarn package managers
< Frontend Development />: React is my main area of expertise. I've used it in pretty every flavor: CSR, SSR, Native. I'm keeping up with all the latest features and most popular libraries - Hooks, Suspense, Redux etc.

In regard to design I'm familar with wide variety of options. While I prefer CSS-in-JS like Styled-Components, I'm perfectly fine with Sass or templating engines like EJS. I adhere to rules of semantic HTML5, Accessibility and BEM naming convention.
[ Backend ]: My node.js knowledge, allows me to write efficient servers and solving complex issues.
I can proficiently use Express and Apollo frameworks. I'm fluent in asynchronous programming and creation of REST and GraphQL APIs.
I understand key aspects of Web Security. Worked with popular methods of Authentication and Authorization. I've acquired knowledge of networks and HTTP/HTTPS protocols.
I'm familiar with popular architectural patterns: Monolith, MVC, SOA, Microservices, Serverless.
( Databases ): Depending on needs, I'm capable of building and maintaining SQL and noSQL databases.
Out of non-relational databases, I'm most comfortable with MongoDB with Mongoose ODM. For relational databases I've used MySQL along with Sequelize library.
Other than that I've had great experience with Firebase platform.
